70903.「この絶え間ない水音……。\n しんと 冷えきった空気……。:
The never-ending sound of the water...
The chilling stillness in the air...

70904.「そうです……。たしかに 私は\n ここに 幽閉されていました。:
Yes... This is the place where I was
imprisoned.

70906.「<cs_pchero>さま…… あの巨人が \n 私の記憶のカギを にぎってい:
<cs_pchero>... That giant seems to hold the
key to my memories...
Please, you have to help me...

70907.「すべて 思いだしました……。\n あの巨人は 私の罪悪感が\n 魔物となって:
I remember everything...
That giant was the manifestation of my
guilt in the form of a monster...

70908.「そう……。私は この場所で\n あの子の声を聞いたんです。:
Yes... This is the place that I heard her
voice.

70909.「……そんなに泣いて どうしたのです テティ？:
What's the matter? Why are you crying,
Tetti?

70910.「あのね あのね シスター・サテラ。\n テティのパパの船 あらしのなかにいるの:
Um...well... My daddy's boat is stuck in a
big storm.

70911.「パパ だいじょーぶかな……。\n ちゃんと ただいまーって かえれるかな……。:
I hope my daddy's okay... I want him to come
back home soon...

70913.「テティ。昨夜 お祈りをしている時\n テティのパパの船を 空の上から見守ってい:
Listen, Tetti. Last night while I was praying,
I heard the stars say they were watching over
your daddy's boat from way up in the sky.

70915.「星々は こう言っていたの。\n テティのパパは もうすぐ 無事に帰ります。:
This is what the stars said...
"Tetti's daddy will be home safe and
sound very soon."

70917.<center>はじめは 子供たちを励ますための\n小さなウソでした……。:
At first, they were just little white lies to
cheer up the children...

70918.<center>テティの お父さまの船は無事に戻り……\nそれからも 私は何度か:
Tetti's father's ship returned safely...
Since then, I had made up several false
prophecies for the children to believe.

70919.<center>そのうち…… 大人たちまでもが\n私の予言のチカラを\n本物だと:
In time, even the adults began talking about
the power of my prophecies...

70920.<center>そして あの日……\n取り返しのつかないことが 起こったのです。:
And on that day...something terrible
happened.

70921.「このひとよ！ このひとが シスター・サテラ！\n おほしさまの声が きけるの。:
This is her! This is Sister Satella! She can
hear the voices of the stars!

70922.「……失礼します。 \n あなたが シスター・サテラ殿ですかな？: Excuse me. You are Sister Satella, yes?

70924.「先の世を見通すチカラをお持ちと\n ウワサに聞き及んでおります。そのチカラに\:
I've heard rumors that you're able to see into
the future. I've come all this way because I
need that power for a favor.

70925.「我が国は 今 戦乱の中にあり \n 国王は 兵をさらに進めるべきか\n 退くべ:
Our country is in the midst of war. Our king
is torn between sending forth more troops
or retreating.

70926.「そこで 我が国王のため どうかひとつ\n 予言を授けては いただけまいか。:
That's why, for the sake of my king...I humbly
request that you grant me one of your
prophecies.

70928.「聖職にあるとはいえ あなたも ひとりの\n 国民として 国を思う気持ちは変わり:
Even though you are one of the church, surely
your feelings of your country remain unchanged
as a citizen. Please, Miss Satella...

70929.「シスター・サテラ……。\n このおじさん とても こまってるみたいよ。:
This old guy seems like he's in big trouble,
Sister Satella.

70931.「ほ…星々が 未来を告げています。\n 今の状況では 兵を……:
T...the stars have revealed the future to me.
They say...as things are now, more troops
are needed...

70933.「強き意志を 持つ者にこそ……\n 勝利の女神は ほほえむでしょう……。:
The Goddess of Victory smiles upon those
who...have a strong will to fight...

70934.「兵を進めるべき……。なるほど。\n それが そなたの 予言なのですな？:
Send more troops, I see... So that is your
prophecy?

70935.「ありがとうございます。\n では 我が王に そのように伝えましょう。:
Thank you very much. I will let my king know
right away.

70936.<center>私の その予言は……\n悲劇の元凶になりました。:
That prophecy...it turned out to be the source
of a terrible tragedy.

70937.<center>私の 偽りの予言通りに\nその国の王が 兵を進めた結果……:
As per my false prophecy, the king sent forth
his troops, and...

70938.<center>その進軍は 敵に読まれていました。\n兵士たちの進んだ先には 罠:
The enemy was prepared for it. The troops
were caught in many traps, and their army was
destroyed with no way of fighting back...

70939.<center>私は 偽りの予言をした罪で\nこのナギリ洞に 閉じ込められました:
I was imprisoned inside of this cave for that
false prophecy I made.

70940.「……こんな大きな罪 私には つぐなえない。: I can no longer bear such a horrible sin...

70941.「もしも 予言のチカラが本物だったら \n 私は 誰も……。:
If the power of prophecy truly does exist,
then I don't believe anyone would...

70944.「あなたは……。\n なんで こんな所に……。: What are you doing in a place like this...?

70946.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされてしまったから\n:
I... I have to go home...but I was cast out,
so I can't go back by myself...

70948.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Hey, miss...do you think you could come with
me? If you're there with me, then I'm sure
I'll be able to go home.

70949.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるから！: I'll...I'll do anything that you ask of me!

70950.「……あなたは 不思議な方ですね。\n もしや 神さまの お使いなのでしょうか。:
You're quite the mysterious person...
Are you a messenger from above, perhaps?

70951.「どうか 私の懺悔を お聞きください……。\n 私は ある国の人々に 偽りの予言:
Please listen to my confession... I have
caused the people of a certain country to
die due to my false prophecy.

70952.「もし私に 本当の予言のチカラがあれば \n あの人々を 死なさずに済んだのに…:
If I truly had the power of prophecy, then I
would not have let those people suffer...

70953.「それが おねえちゃんの願いなんだね？\n わかった。それじゃあ 目を閉じて……:
So that's what you want, then? Okay.
Now, close your eyes...

70955.「歌が……聴こえます……。\n これは 星が歌っているの……？:
I can hear...a song...
Are the stars...singing...?

70956.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: You'll come with me now, right?

70959.「……すべて 思いだしました。 \n 何が 私を 世告げの姫として\n 動かして:
I remember everything. I remember what drove
me to become a Princess of Prophecy...

70960.「しかし 後悔はありません……。\n 世告げの姫として 人々を救うことが\n 少:
But I have no regrets... If saving others as a
Princess of Prophecy can atone for my sin,
even if just a little...

70961.「それに 世告げの姫としての使命が終わったら \n 私は あの教会へ戻り 本当の:
And when my mission as a Princess is finished,
I can return to that church and use that power
to reach out to those who are lost...

70962.「<cs_pchero>さま ありがとうございます。\n この記憶があれば 災厄:
Thank you, <cs_pchero>. With these
memories, we will be able to defeat the
King of Calamity's illusions.

70963.「こちらは 心ばかりの お礼になります。\n 災厄の王との決戦に お役立てくださ:
This is just a small token of my thanks.
Please use it in your battle to come.

70964.「<cs_pchero>さま 覚えておいでですか？\n 幾千の星が舞い散った あ:
Do you remember, <cs_pchero>?
That day when thousands of stars danced
through the sky...

70965.「あの時より 何度も救っていただいて\n <cs_pchero>さまは 見違える:
Since then, you have saved us many times, and
have become much stronger.

70966.「舵取りのマレンが <cs_pchero>さまのことを \n 待っているはずです:
I'm certain that Maren is waiting for you.
Please help her next.

70967.「……星々は やがて歌うでしょう。\n <cs_pchero>さまの 勝利の歌を:
The stars will soon sing of your triumphant
song, <cs_pchero>...
